text: Welcome to My Secret Heart is the second studio album by Robby Maria and was released on October 10, 2014.JPC http://www.jpc.de/jpcng/poprock/detail/-/art/robby-maria-welcome-to-my-secret- heart/hnum/5660890?lang=en All songs were recorded between January and February 2014 at the Funkhaus Studios in Berlin, studios in operation at the time of the German Democratic Republic. Maria was influenced by musicians from various European countries and Canada in order to create a sound different to his previous releases.M. Wiezcorek http://muzykanowy.wordpress.com/2014/09/13/robby-maria-welcome-to-my-secret- heart-october-2014-timezone-records/ The first single from the album, "Sick Young Man", was published on September 19, 2014 alongside a video shot by German filmmaker Stephan Metzner. Muzu TV http://www.muzu.tv/_sv/robby- maria/robby-maria-sick-young-man-official-video-music-video/2297783/ ==Track listing== # Welcome to the Suicide Days – 2:36 # Sick Young Man – 3:07 # Miracle Man – 3:23 # Not for Anyone – 1:47 # No Heroes – 3:05 # Neverland – 2:59 # October Winds – 2:22 # The New Hope Song – 2:57 # Pan's Journey – 3:26 # The Game – 2:38 # Killing Myself to Live – 2:54 # On a Lonely Day – 2:02 # Message from the Silent Sun – 2:25 ==Band== *Robby Maria – vocals, acoustic and electric guitars, bass, rhodes, string arrangements *Anni Müller – drums, percussions *Meike Jürgens - vocals *Iza Höll - vocals *Franz Bauer - marimba *Stephan Metzner - solo guitar *Tanya Bartels - saxophone *Tanja Hutterer - piano ==Reception== Phil Dunn of the British magazine On the Scout wrote: "...I would love to hear more from this man, who not only entertained, but also mesmerized me for almost 40 minutes.". Phil Dunn http://on-the-scout- co.uk.over-blog.com/2014/09/robby-maria-germany.html Magda Wiezcorek of the Polish music magazine Muzykanowy wrote: "...Welcome To My Secret Heart is not just another singer-songwriter album, but a real chance to experience an authentic piece of originality." Magda Wiezcorek, "Muzykanowy" http://muzykanowy.wordpress.com/2014/09/13/robby-maria-welcome-to-my-secret- heart-october-2014-timezone-records/ ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Robby Maria albums
title: Welcome to My Secret Heart
